article: Ship quickly with user interface source code, clone existing interfaces, AI-powered customization.

name: Cursor
desc: AI-first code editor that integrates models directly into your workflow for inline suggestions, refactoring, and debugging.

name: Bolt
desc: AI-assisted app builder that turns prompts into full-stack applications with iteration, hosting, and code export options.

name: Claude (Anthropic)
desc: AI assistant by Anthropic focused on helpfulness, safety, and constitutional AI for chat, writing, coding, and analysis.

name: Lovable
desc: AI-powered app builder that helps generate, iterate, and deploy full-stack applications from natural language descriptions.

name: Firebase Studio
desc: Tooling around Firebase that streamlines building, managing, and deploying backend services for web and mobile apps.

name: Cline
desc: AI coding agent designed to work alongside developers, handling tasks like editing, debugging, and running code autonomously.

name: Aider
desc: Command-line AI pair programmer that edits your existing codebase via git-aware chats in your terminal environment.

name: Trae
desc: AI platform focused on building and orchestrating autonomous agents for business workflows, data tasks, and operations.

name: Kiro
desc: Developer assistant that integrates AI into your coding workflow, helping with generation, refactoring, and understanding codebases.

name: Vercel
desc: Frontend cloud platform for developing, previewing, and shipping web applications with integrated serverless and edge functions.

name: Baset44
desc: Platform providing AI-driven tools and infrastructure to accelerate software development and product experimentation.

name: Windsurf
desc: AI-powered coding environment aimed at helping developers build, refactor, and ship software faster with intelligent assistance.

name: Codex
desc: Code-focused AI model from OpenAI that translates natural language instructions into working code in many programming languages.

name: Replit
desc: Online IDE and hosting platform with collaborative coding, instant deployments, and built-in AI tools for developers.

name: AWS App Studio
desc: Amazon service that lets users build applications quickly using AI assistance and AWS-managed infrastructure components.

name: ChatGPT (OpenAI)
desc: Conversational AI by OpenAI for answering questions, writing, coding help, creative work, and task automation through chat.

name: Gemini (Google)
desc: Googleâ€™s multimodal AI assistant integrating search, coding, and productivity features across web and mobile experiences.

name: Perplexity AI
desc: Answer engine combining web search and AI to deliver concise, cited responses and follow-up exploration in a chat interface.

name: Microsoft Copilot
desc: AI assistant integrated with Microsoft services to help with search, content creation, work documents, and productivity tasks.

name: GitHub Copilot
desc: AI coding assistant in editors like VS Code that suggests code, tests, and documentation directly from your context.

name: Zapier AI / Chatbots
desc: Tools for building AI chatbots and automations that connect large language models with thousands of business apps and workflows.

name: ElevenLabs (voice)
desc: AI voice platform offering lifelike text-to-speech, voice cloning, dubbing, and audio tools for creators and developers.

name: AskCodi
desc: AI assistant for developers offering code completion, documentation help, test generation, and language support inside editors.

name: Amazon Q Developer
desc: AWS generative AI assistant that helps developers understand code, generate changes, and interact with AWS resources.

name: Tabnine
desc: AI code completion tool that runs locally or in cloud, offering privacy-focused suggestions trained on open-source code.

name: OpenHands
desc: Open-source AI software engineering agent that autonomously edits repositories, runs tools, and executes development tasks.

name: Rork
desc: Platform centered on AI-powered coding and collaboration, helping teams prototype, review, and ship software faster.

name: Void Editor
desc: Modern code editor enhanced with AI features for smarter navigation, suggestions, and project-wide code understanding.

name: AmpCode
desc: AI development environment that helps generate, refactor, and maintain applications with conversational guidance.

name: ZedDev
desc: High-performance, multiplayer code editor with AI-assisted development features and low-latency collaboration for teams.

name: Qodo
desc: AI coding and app-building platform that lets users describe features and generate production-ready codebases quickly.

name: Junie
desc: JetBrains AI assistant integrated with IDEs to help with code generation, navigation, explanations, and refactoring.

name: AugmentCode
desc: AI tool focused on augmenting developer productivity with code suggestions, explanations, and repository-level understanding.

name: KiloCode
desc: AI coding assistant and automation platform built to help teams generate, analyze, and maintain complex software systems.

name: Gitar
desc: AI assistant for software projects that understands repositories, suggests changes, and supports collaborative coding workflows.

name: Mistral AI
desc: Company developing open and commercial large language models for chat, coding, and enterprise AI applications.

name: Warp Dev
desc: Modern terminal with AI features, structured commands, and collaboration tools to improve developer productivity.

name: Smyth OS
desc: Platform for building, orchestrating, and deploying AI agents that connect to tools, data sources, and enterprise workflows.

name: Xano
desc: No-code backend platform providing APIs, database, and business logic for applications without managing servers.

name: Google Antigraviity
desc: Google experimental experience featuring playful, physics-bending interactions to showcase creative web technologies.

name: Daytona
desc: Developer platform offering reproducible cloud development environments to standardize and accelerate onboarding.

name: Bubble IO
desc: No-code visual web app builder for designing, hosting, and scaling full-featured applications without traditional programming.

name: PromptHub
desc: Tooling for organizing, testing, and collaborating on prompts and AI workflows across teams and projects.

name: Stainless
desc: Platform that helps companies generate robust SDKs and client libraries from APIs with strong type safety.

name: Codiga
desc: Code analysis and review tool that checks style, security, and quality issues with automated insights for developers.

name: CodeRabbit
desc: AI-powered code review assistant that comments on pull requests, suggesting improvements and catching potential issues.

name: Supabase
desc: Open-source Firebase alternative offering Postgres database, authentication, storage, and edge functions for apps.

name: Pocketbase
desc: Lightweight open-source backend in a single binary with database, auth, and realtime subscriptions.

name: Railway
desc: Cloud platform for deploying applications and databases with simple workflows, environments, and observability.

name: Pear AI
desc: AI coding pair that integrates into development workflows, helping write, refactor, and understand complex codebases.

name: Theia
desc: Extensible, open-source cloud and desktop IDE framework used to build customized development environments.

name: Traycer
desc: AI-powered debugger and runtime analysis tool to trace, inspect, and understand program behavior more easily.
